title: aDimuDi kANAda deivattin mEl Eri
sahitya:
aDimuDi kANAda deivattin mEl Eri anju mukham kaNDa deivamE engaL 
Arumukham kaNDa deivamE engaL Arumukham koNDa deivamE


anupallavi

  paDi palavAna pazhani malaimElE pArkkat-tighaTTAda panniru kai vElA


caraNam    innAr innapaDi enrE terinda pin eDuttu sholvadenrO nIti 
ennAlE sholvadella indap-pazhamozhi ettanaiyO pEr shonna shEdi 
shonnAlum teriyAda tUya niraivAna shuddha nirguNamAna jyOti 
ponnAlE AnAl enna? Ambalam ambalamE pinnAlE teriyum anda shEdi
